HomePage.title: PDFuck - Free Online PDF Tools
HomePage.description: Free browser-based PDF tools. Merge, split, compress, rotate, convert PDFs. 100% privacy - files never leave your device.

hero.title: Free Online PDF Tools
hero.subtitle: Merge, split, compress, convert, rotate, and edit PDF files directly in your browser. No uploads, no registration, 100% private.
hero.privacy: Your files never leave your device - all processing happens locally in your browser.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Process PDFs instantly in your browser without waiting for uploads or downloads.

secure.title: 100% Private
secure.description: Your files are processed locally and never uploaded to any server.

free.title: Completely Free
free.description: All tools are free to use with no hidden fees or subscriptions.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Powerful PDF Tools
features.description: Everything you need to work with PDF files, right in your browser

item-1.title: Browser-Based Processing
item-1.description: All PDF processing happens locally in your browser. Your files never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy and security.

item-2.title: 100% Free
item-2.description: All tools are completely free to use with no registration, no watermarks, and no limitations. Process as many files as you need.

item-3.title: Fast & Efficient
item-3.description: Process PDFs instantly without waiting for uploads or downloads. Our optimized algorithms handle your files quickly and efficiently.

item-4.title: High Quality Output
item-4.description: Maintain the original quality of your PDFs. All operations are performed with precision to preserve your document's integrity.

tools.title: All PDF Tools
tools.subtitle: Choose from our collection of 10+ free PDF tools to handle any task.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get your PDF tasks done in three simple steps

step1.title: Select Tool
step1.description: Choose the PDF tool that fits your needs from our collection.

step2.title: Upload Files
step2.description: Drag and drop your files or click to browse. Files stay on your device.

step3.title: Download Result
step3.description: Process your files and download the result instantly.

features2.title: Why Choose PDFuck
features2.subtitle: The Best PDF Tools
features2.description: Powerful, private, and completely free PDF tools for all your needs
features2.feature-1: Process files instantly in your browser
features2.feature-2: No uploads - your files never leave your device

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our PDF tools

item-1.question: Are my files uploaded to a server?
item-1.answer: No. All processing happens directly in your browser using JavaScript. Your files never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy.

item-2.question: Is there a file size limit?
item-2.answer: Files up to 100MB are supported. The actual limit depends on your browser's available memory and device capabilities.

item-3.question: Are the tools really free?
item-3.answer: Yes, all PDF tools are completely free to use with no registration, no watermarks, and no limitations.

item-4.question: Will the quality of my PDFs be affected?
item-4.answer: No, our tools preserve the original quality of your PDFs. Operations like merging, splitting, and rotating are lossless.

item-5.question: What browsers are supported?
item-5.answer: Our tools work in all modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. Make sure your browser is up to date for the best experience.

calltoaction.title: Get Started
calltoaction.description: PDFuck lets you handle all your PDF needs in seconds

ToolsPage.title: PDF Tools
ToolsPage.description: Free online PDF tools to merge, split, compress, convert, rotate, and edit PDF files. All processing happens in your browser.
ToolsPage.metaTitle: Free Online PDF Tools - Merge, Split, Compress & More
ToolsPage.metaDescription: Free browser-based PDF tools. Merge, split, compress, rotate PDFs. Convert PDF to images and images to PDF. No uploads - 100% private.

hero.title: Free Online PDF Tools
hero.subtitle: All processing happens in your browser. Your files never leave your device.

dropzone.title: Drop your files here
dropzone.subtitle: or click to browse
dropzone.hint: Files are processed locally in your browser

common.privacy: Your files are processed locally and never uploaded to any server.

mergePdf.name: Merge PDF
mergePdf.description: Combine multiple PDF files into a single document.
mergePdf.metaTitle: Merge PDF Files Online Free - PDF Combiner
mergePdf.metaDescription: Merge multiple PDF files into one document for free. Drag and drop to reorder. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
mergePdf.longDescription: Combine multiple PDF documents into a single file quickly and easily. Drag and drop your PDF files, arrange them in your preferred order, and merge. All processing happens locally in your browser.

item-1.question: How many PDF files can I merge at once?
item-1.answer: There is no hard limit on the number of files. However, very large files may take longer to process depending on your device's memory.

item-2.question: Will merging reduce the quality of my PDFs?
item-2.answer: No. The merge operation preserves the original quality of all pages. No recompression or quality loss occurs.

item-3.question: Are my files uploaded to a server?
item-3.answer: No. All processing happens directly in your browser. Your files never leave your device.

item-4.question: Can I reorder pages before merging?
item-4.answer: Yes. You can drag and drop files to change their order before merging them into a single PDF.

item-5.question: What is the maximum file size?
item-5.answer: Files up to 100MB each are supported. The actual limit depends on your browser's available memory.

item-1.title: Combining Business Reports
item-1.description: Merge monthly reports, financial statements, and appendices into a single comprehensive document.

item-2.title: Assembling Applications
item-2.description: Combine cover letters, resumes, transcripts, and certificates into one application PDF.

item-3.title: Creating Course Materials
item-3.description: Merge lecture slides, reading materials, and assignments into unified course packets.

item-4.title: Archiving Documents
item-4.description: Combine related documents into organized archive files for long-term storage.

splitPdf.name: Split PDF
splitPdf.description: Separate a PDF into individual pages or custom ranges.
splitPdf.metaTitle: Split PDF Online Free - Extract PDF Pages
splitPdf.metaDescription: Split PDF files into individual pages or custom page ranges for free. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
splitPdf.longDescription: Split a PDF document into individual pages or extract specific page ranges. Select which pages you want to extract, and download them as separate PDF files.

item-1.question: Can I split a PDF into individual pages?
item-1.answer: Yes. You can split a PDF into individual single-page files or define custom page ranges.

item-2.question: Can I extract specific pages from a PDF?
item-2.answer: Yes. Select the exact pages or page ranges you want to extract from the original document.

item-3.question: Will splitting affect the page quality?
item-3.answer: No. Each extracted page maintains the original quality and formatting.

item-4.question: How do I define custom page ranges?
item-4.answer: Enter page ranges like '1-3, 5, 7-9' to extract those specific pages into separate files.

item-5.question: Is there a page limit?
item-5.answer: No fixed limit. The tool can handle large PDFs, limited only by your browser's memory.

item-1.title: Extracting Specific Chapters
item-1.description: Pull individual chapters from a large document for focused reading or sharing.

item-2.title: Removing Unwanted Pages
item-2.description: Extract only the pages you need, effectively removing unwanted content.

item-3.title: Creating Handouts
item-3.description: Extract specific slides or pages from presentations to create focused handouts.

item-4.title: Breaking Down Large Documents
item-4.description: Split lengthy reports into manageable sections for easier distribution.

compressPdf.name: Compress PDF
compressPdf.description: Reduce PDF file size while preserving quality.
compressPdf.metaTitle: Compress PDF Online Free - Reduce PDF File Size
compressPdf.metaDescription: Compress PDF files to reduce file size for free. Optimize PDFs for email and web. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
compressPdf.longDescription: Reduce the file size of your PDF documents by removing unused objects and optimizing the document structure. Perfect for making PDFs easier to share via email or upload to websites.

item-1.question: How much can my PDF be compressed?
item-1.answer: Compression results vary depending on the PDF content. Documents with large embedded images see the most reduction.

item-2.question: Will compression reduce the visual quality?
item-2.answer: The optimization focuses on removing unused objects and streamlining the file structure. Visual quality is preserved.

item-3.question: Can I compress multiple PDFs at once?
item-3.answer: Currently, you can compress one PDF at a time. Process each file individually for best results.

item-4.question: What if the compressed file is the same size?
item-4.answer: If the PDF is already optimized, compression may not reduce the size significantly. The tool will show you the before and after sizes.

item-5.question: Is the compression lossless?
item-5.answer: Yes. The compression removes redundant data without affecting the visible content of the document.

item-1.title: Email Attachments
item-1.description: Reduce PDF size to meet email attachment limits and send documents more easily.

item-2.title: Web Upload
item-2.description: Optimize PDFs for faster upload and download on websites and online forms.

item-3.title: Storage Optimization
item-3.description: Reduce the storage space needed for large PDF archives.

item-4.title: Faster Sharing
item-4.description: Smaller files transfer faster through messaging apps and file sharing services.

rotatePdf.name: Rotate PDF
rotatePdf.description: Rotate PDF pages to the correct orientation.
rotatePdf.metaDescription: Rotate PDF pages by 90, 180, or 270 degrees for free. Fix page orientation easily. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
rotatePdf.longDescription: Rotate individual pages or all pages in your PDF document. Fix incorrectly oriented pages by rotating them 90, 180, or 270 degrees. Preview each page before applying changes.

item-1.question: Can I rotate individual pages?
item-1.answer: Yes. You can rotate each page independently or apply the same rotation to all pages at once.

item-2.question: What rotation angles are supported?
item-2.answer: You can rotate pages by 90¬∞ (clockwise), 180¬∞, or 270¬∞ (counter-clockwise).

item-3.question: Will rotation affect the content quality?
item-3.answer: No. Rotation only changes the page orientation without any effect on content quality.

item-4.question: Can I preview pages before rotating?
item-4.answer: Yes. You can see thumbnails of all pages and preview the rotation before applying it.

item-5.question: Can I undo a rotation?
item-5.answer: Yes. Simply rotate the page again to return it to the original orientation, or start over.

item-1.title: Fixing Scanned Documents
item-1.description: Correct the orientation of scanned pages that were fed in the wrong direction.

item-2.title: Landscape to Portrait
item-2.description: Rotate landscape pages to portrait orientation or vice versa for consistent formatting.

item-3.title: Presentation Preparation
item-3.description: Ensure all pages in a document are oriented correctly before presenting or printing.

item-4.title: Mixed Orientation Documents
item-4.description: Fix documents where some pages are rotated differently from others.

pdfToPng.name: PDF to PNG
pdfToPng.description: Convert PDF pages to high-quality PNG images with lossless compression.
pdfToPng.metaTitle: Convert PDF to PNG Online Free - PDF to PNG Converter
pdfToPng.metaDescription: Convert PDF pages to PNG images for free. High-quality lossless conversion with adjustable resolution. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
pdfToPng.longDescription: Convert each page of your PDF document into high-quality PNG images with lossless compression. PNG preserves sharp text and graphics perfectly, making it ideal for documents, screenshots, and images requiring transparency support.

item-1.question: Why choose PNG over other formats?
item-1.answer: PNG uses lossless compression, meaning no quality is lost during conversion. It preserves sharp text, clean lines, and supports transparency ‚Äî ideal for documents and graphics.

item-2.question: Can I adjust the image resolution?
item-2.answer: Yes. Use the scale slider to set the output resolution from 1x to 4x. The default is 2x (144 DPI), suitable for most use cases.

item-3.question: Will PNG files be larger than JPG?
item-3.answer: Generally yes, because PNG uses lossless compression. However, for text-heavy documents, the difference is often minimal while the quality is noticeably better.

item-4.question: Does PNG support transparency?
item-4.answer: Yes. PNG supports alpha transparency, so any transparent areas in your PDF will be preserved in the output images.

item-5.question: Can I convert a multi-page PDF?
item-5.answer: Yes. Each page is converted to a separate PNG file that you can download individually.

item-1.title: Document Archiving
item-1.description: Convert important documents to PNG for lossless archival storage.

item-2.title: Web Publishing
item-2.description: Create crisp PNG images from PDF content for websites and blogs.

item-3.title: Design Assets
item-3.description: Extract pages as high-quality PNG files for use in graphic design projects.

item-4.title: Presentation Materials
item-4.description: Convert PDF slides to PNG images for embedding in presentations.

pdfToJpg.name: PDF to JPG
pdfToJpg.description: Convert PDF pages to JPG images with adjustable quality.
pdfToJpg.metaTitle: Convert PDF to JPG Online Free - PDF to JPEG Converter
pdfToJpg.metaDescription: Convert PDF pages to JPG/JPEG images for free. Adjustable quality and resolution settings. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
pdfToJpg.longDescription: Convert each page of your PDF document into JPG images. Adjust the quality and resolution to balance file size and visual fidelity. JPG is the most widely supported image format, ideal for photos, web use, and sharing.

item-1.question: Can I adjust the JPG quality?
item-1.answer: Yes. Use the quality slider to set output quality from 10% to 100%. Higher quality means larger file sizes but better visual fidelity.

item-2.question: What resolution will the images be?
item-2.answer: The default is 2x scale (144 DPI). You can increase up to 4x for high-resolution output or decrease to 1x for smaller files.

item-3.question: What is the difference between JPG and PNG?
item-3.answer: JPG uses lossy compression for smaller files, best for photos. PNG uses lossless compression for perfect quality, best for text and graphics.

item-4.question: Can I convert a multi-page PDF?
item-4.answer: Yes. Each page is converted to a separate JPG file that you can download individually.

item-5.question: Will colors be preserved accurately?
item-5.answer: Yes. JPG supports millions of colors and handles photographs and gradient-rich documents very well.

item-1.title: Social Media Sharing
item-1.description: Convert PDF content to JPG for posting on social media platforms.

item-2.title: Email Attachments
item-2.description: Create compact JPG images from PDFs for easy email sharing.

item-3.title: Website Thumbnails
item-3.description: Generate lightweight JPG previews of PDF documents for web display.

item-4.title: Photo Printing
item-4.description: Convert photo-rich PDF pages to JPG for professional printing services.

pdfToWebp.name: PDF to WebP
pdfToWebp.description: Convert PDF pages to modern WebP images with superior compression.
pdfToWebp.metaTitle: Convert PDF to WebP Online Free - PDF to WebP Converter
pdfToWebp.metaDescription: Convert PDF pages to WebP images for free. Modern format with superior compression and quality. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
pdfToWebp.longDescription: Convert each page of your PDF document into WebP images, the modern image format developed by Google. WebP offers superior compression with excellent visual quality, resulting in significantly smaller file sizes compared to JPG and PNG.

item-1.question: What is WebP format?
item-1.answer: WebP is a modern image format developed by Google that provides superior lossy and lossless compression. It produces smaller files than JPG and PNG while maintaining comparable quality.

item-2.question: Is WebP supported by all browsers?
item-2.answer: WebP is supported by all modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Edge, and Safari 16+. It has over 97% global browser support.

item-3.question: Can I adjust the WebP quality?
item-3.answer: Yes. Use the quality slider to balance file size and visual quality. Lower quality produces smaller files, while higher quality preserves more detail.

item-4.question: How does WebP compare to JPG?
item-4.answer: WebP typically produces files 25-35% smaller than JPG at equivalent visual quality, making it ideal for web use where bandwidth matters.

item-5.question: Can I convert a multi-page PDF?
item-5.answer: Yes. Each page is converted to a separate WebP file that you can download individually.

item-1.title: Web Optimization
item-1.description: Create WebP images for faster website loading with smaller file sizes.

item-2.title: Bandwidth Reduction
item-2.description: Convert PDFs to WebP for efficient delivery in bandwidth-constrained environments.

item-3.title: CDN & Hosting
item-3.description: Generate WebP images to reduce storage and delivery costs on CDNs.

item-4.title: Modern Web Development
item-4.description: Produce WebP assets from PDF source files for modern web applications.

pngToPdf.name: PNG to PDF
pngToPdf.description: Convert PNG images to a PDF document.
pngToPdf.metaTitle: Convert PNG to PDF Online Free - PNG to PDF Converter
pngToPdf.metaDescription: Convert PNG images to PDF for free. Arrange and combine multiple PNGs into one PDF. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
pngToPdf.longDescription: Convert your PNG images into a PDF document. Upload multiple PNG files, arrange them in the desired order with drag-and-drop, and combine them into a single PDF. Image quality is preserved at the original resolution.

item-1.question: Will PNG quality be preserved in the PDF?
item-1.answer: Yes. PNG images are embedded at their original resolution in the PDF. No compression is applied during conversion.

item-2.question: Can I reorder images before converting?
item-2.answer: Yes. Drag and drop to arrange your PNG images in the preferred order before creating the PDF.

item-3.question: Is transparency preserved in the PDF?
item-3.answer: PNG transparency is preserved when the image is embedded in the PDF, though the PDF viewer may display transparent areas as white.

item-4.question: How many PNG images can I combine?
item-4.answer: There is no hard limit. The number of images you can process depends on your device's available memory.

item-5.question: What will the page size be?
item-5.answer: Each PDF page is automatically sized to match the dimensions of its corresponding PNG image.

item-1.title: Screenshot Compilation
item-1.description: Combine multiple screenshots into a single organized PDF document.

item-2.title: Design Portfolio
item-2.description: Compile PNG design assets into a professional PDF portfolio.

item-3.title: Document Scanning
item-3.description: Convert scanned PNG images into a well-organized PDF document.

item-4.title: Report Creation
item-4.description: Assemble PNG charts, diagrams, and graphics into a PDF report.

jpgToPdf.name: JPG to PDF
jpgToPdf.description: Convert JPG images to a PDF document.
jpgToPdf.metaTitle: Convert JPG to PDF Online Free - JPEG to PDF Converter
jpgToPdf.metaDescription: Convert JPG/JPEG images to PDF for free. Combine multiple photos into one PDF. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
jpgToPdf.longDescription: Convert your JPG images into a PDF document. Upload multiple JPEG files, arrange them in your preferred order with drag-and-drop, and combine them into a single PDF. Perfect for creating photo books, document compilations, and more.

item-1.question: Will JPG quality be preserved in the PDF?
item-1.answer: Yes. JPG images are embedded at their original quality in the PDF document. No additional compression is applied.

item-2.question: Can I reorder photos before converting?
item-2.answer: Yes. Drag and drop to arrange your JPG images in the preferred order before creating the PDF.

item-3.question: Does it accept both .jpg and .jpeg files?
item-3.answer: Yes. Both .jpg and .jpeg file extensions are accepted ‚Äî they are the same format.

item-4.question: How many JPG images can I combine?
item-4.answer: There is no hard limit. The number of images depends on your device's available memory.

item-5.question: What will the page size be?
item-5.answer: Each PDF page is automatically sized to match the dimensions of its corresponding JPG image.

item-1.title: Photo Albums
item-1.description: Combine vacation or event photos into a single PDF album for sharing.

item-2.title: Receipt Collection
item-2.description: Merge receipt photos into one PDF for organized expense reporting.

item-3.title: Real Estate Listings
item-3.description: Compile property photos into a professional PDF presentation.

item-4.title: Travel Documentation
item-4.description: Combine travel document photos into a single PDF for easy access.

webpToPdf.name: WebP to PDF
webpToPdf.description: Convert WebP images to a PDF document.
webpToPdf.metaTitle: Convert WebP to PDF Online Free - WebP to PDF Converter
webpToPdf.metaDescription: Convert WebP images to PDF for free. Combine multiple WebP files into one PDF. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
webpToPdf.longDescription: Convert your WebP images into a PDF document. Upload multiple WebP files, arrange them in your preferred order with drag-and-drop, and combine them into a single PDF. WebP images are automatically converted for maximum PDF compatibility.

item-1.question: How are WebP images handled in the PDF?
item-1.answer: WebP images are automatically converted to PNG format before being embedded in the PDF. This ensures maximum compatibility with all PDF viewers.

item-2.question: Will image quality be preserved?
item-2.answer: Yes. The conversion process preserves the visual quality of your WebP images in the resulting PDF document.

item-3.question: Can I reorder images before converting?
item-3.answer: Yes. Drag and drop to arrange your WebP images in the preferred order before creating the PDF.

item-4.question: How many WebP images can I combine?
item-4.answer: There is no hard limit. The number of images depends on your device's available memory.

item-5.question: What will the page size be?
item-5.answer: Each PDF page is automatically sized to match the dimensions of its corresponding WebP image.

item-1.title: Web Asset Archiving
item-1.description: Convert downloaded WebP images from websites into archived PDF documents.

item-2.title: Image Format Conversion
item-2.description: Bridge WebP images into PDF format for sharing with users who lack WebP support.

item-3.title: Design Documentation
item-3.description: Compile WebP design assets into a professional PDF for client review.

item-4.title: Cross-Platform Sharing
item-4.description: Convert WebP files to universally accessible PDF for sharing across platforms.

watermarkPdf.name: Add Watermark
watermarkPdf.description: Add text watermarks to your PDF documents.
watermarkPdf.metaTitle: Add Watermark to PDF Online Free
watermarkPdf.metaDescription: Add text watermarks to PDF documents for free. Customize text, size, color, and position. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
watermarkPdf.longDescription: Add custom text watermarks to your PDF documents. Configure the watermark text, font size, color, opacity, rotation, and position. Apply watermarks to all pages at once.

item-1.question: Can I customize the watermark appearance?
item-1.answer: Yes. You can adjust the text, font size, color, opacity, rotation angle, and position.

item-2.question: Is the watermark applied to all pages?
item-2.answer: Yes. The watermark is applied uniformly to every page in the document.

item-3.question: Can I add image watermarks?
item-3.answer: Currently, only text watermarks are supported. Image watermark support may be added in the future.

item-4.question: Can I remove a watermark after adding it?
item-4.answer: The watermark is permanently embedded in the new PDF. Keep your original file if you may need the unwatermarked version.

item-5.question: Will the watermark cover the existing content?
item-5.answer: You can adjust the opacity to make the watermark semi-transparent so it doesn't obscure the underlying content.

item-1.title: Protecting Drafts
item-1.description: Add 'DRAFT' watermarks to documents that are not yet finalized.

item-2.title: Confidential Documents
item-2.description: Mark sensitive documents with 'CONFIDENTIAL' watermarks to indicate restricted access.

item-3.title: Branding
item-3.description: Add your company name or logo text as a watermark to branded documents.

item-4.title: Copyright Protection
item-4.description: Add copyright notices to protect your original content from unauthorized use.

pageNumbers.name: Add Page Numbers
pageNumbers.description: Add page numbers to your PDF documents.
pageNumbers.metaTitle: Add Page Numbers to PDF Online Free
pageNumbers.metaDescription: Add page numbers to PDF documents for free. Choose position, format, and starting number. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
pageNumbers.longDescription: Add page numbers to your PDF documents with full control over position, format, and styling. Choose from numeric, Roman numeral, or 'Page X of Y' formats. Place numbers at any corner or center position.

item-1.question: What number formats are available?
item-1.answer: You can choose from numeric (1, 2, 3), Roman numerals (I, II, III), or 'Page X of Y' format.

item-2.question: Can I choose where the numbers appear?
item-2.answer: Yes. You can place page numbers at the top or bottom of the page, aligned left, center, or right.

item-3.question: Can I start from a number other than 1?
item-3.answer: Yes. You can set any starting page number.

item-4.question: Will page numbers overlap existing content?
item-4.answer: Page numbers are placed in the margin area. For best results, ensure your document has sufficient margins.

item-5.question: Can I skip numbering on certain pages?
item-5.answer: Currently, page numbers are added to all pages. You can use the extract tool to separate pages if needed.

item-1.title: Academic Papers
item-1.description: Add proper page numbering to academic papers and theses.

item-2.title: Legal Documents
item-2.description: Number pages in legal documents for reference and indexing.

item-3.title: Manuals and Guides
item-3.description: Add page numbers to user manuals and instruction guides for easy navigation.

item-4.title: Book Manuscripts
item-4.description: Add professional page numbering to book manuscripts before submission.

reorderPages.name: Reorder Pages
reorderPages.description: Drag and drop to rearrange PDF pages.
reorderPages.metaDescription: Rearrange PDF pages by dragging and dropping for free. Reorder pages visually. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
reorderPages.longDescription: Rearrange the pages in your PDF document by dragging and dropping page thumbnails. See a visual preview of each page and easily move them to create your desired page order.

item-1.question: How do I reorder pages?
item-1.answer: Simply drag and drop the page thumbnails to rearrange them in your desired order.

item-2.question: Can I see page previews?
item-2.answer: Yes. Each page is shown as a thumbnail so you can easily identify and arrange pages.

item-3.question: Will reordering affect page content?
item-3.answer: No. Only the order of pages changes. The content of each page remains identical.

item-4.question: Can I reorder pages in a large PDF?
item-4.answer: Yes. The tool supports large PDFs, though generating thumbnails for many pages may take a moment.

item-5.question: Can I also delete pages while reordering?
item-5.answer: For deleting pages, use the Extract Pages tool where you can select only the pages you want to keep.

item-1.title: Fixing Page Order
item-1.description: Correct documents where pages were scanned or added in the wrong order.

item-2.title: Custom Presentations
item-2.description: Rearrange presentation slides to create a custom flow for different audiences.

item-3.title: Document Reorganization
item-3.description: Move sections around in reports and documents to improve logical flow.

item-4.title: Priority Ordering
item-4.description: Move the most important pages to the front of a document.

extractPages.name: Extract Pages
extractPages.description: Select and extract specific pages from a PDF.
extractPages.metaDescription: Extract specific pages from PDF documents for free. Select pages visually and download. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
extractPages.longDescription: Extract specific pages from your PDF document. View page thumbnails, select the pages you want to keep, and create a new PDF containing only those pages.

item-1.question: How do I select pages to extract?
item-1.answer: Click on page thumbnails to select or deselect them. Selected pages will be highlighted.

item-2.question: Can I extract non-consecutive pages?
item-2.answer: Yes. You can select any combination of pages, whether consecutive or scattered throughout the document.

item-3.question: Will extracted pages keep their formatting?
item-3.answer: Yes. Each extracted page maintains its original formatting, images, and text.

item-4.question: Can I extract pages from a protected PDF?
item-4.answer: This depends on the type of protection. Some encrypted PDFs may not be processable in the browser.

item-5.question: Is there a limit on the number of pages I can extract?
item-5.answer: No. You can extract as many pages as you want from the original document.

item-1.title: Selecting Key Pages
item-1.description: Extract only the most important pages from a lengthy document.

item-2.title: Creating Summaries
item-2.description: Pull out summary or conclusion pages from reports for quick review.

item-3.title: Removing Sensitive Content
item-3.description: Create a version of a document without confidential pages for sharing.

item-4.title: Building Custom Documents
item-4.description: Extract pages from multiple documents to compile a custom reference.

deletePages.name: Delete Pages
deletePages.description: Remove specific pages from a PDF document.
deletePages.metaTitle: Delete PDF Pages Online Free - Remove Pages from PDF
deletePages.metaDescription: Delete specific pages from PDF documents for free. Select and remove unwanted pages visually. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
deletePages.longDescription: Remove unwanted pages from your PDF document quickly and easily. View page thumbnails, select the pages you want to delete, and create a clean PDF without them. All processing happens locally in your browser for complete privacy.

item-1.question: How do I select pages to delete?
item-1.answer: Click on page thumbnails to mark them for deletion. Selected pages will be highlighted. You can also use the Select All or Deselect All buttons for bulk selection.

item-2.question: Can I delete non-consecutive pages?
item-2.answer: Yes. You can select any combination of pages to delete, whether they are consecutive or scattered throughout the document.

item-3.question: Will the remaining pages keep their formatting?
item-3.answer: Yes. All pages that are not deleted retain their original formatting, images, text, and hyperlinks.

item-4.question: Can I undo the deletion after downloading?
item-4.answer: The original file is never modified. If you need the deleted pages later, simply process the original file again.

item-5.question: Is there a limit to how many pages I can delete?
item-5.answer: You can delete any number of pages, but at least one page must remain in the final document.

item-1.title: Removing Cover Pages
item-1.description: Delete unnecessary cover pages, blank pages, or filler pages from documents before sharing.

item-2.title: Cleaning Up Scanned Documents
item-2.description: Remove accidentally scanned blank or duplicate pages from scanned PDF files.

item-3.title: Redacting Confidential Sections
item-3.description: Delete pages containing sensitive or confidential information before distributing a document.

item-4.title: Streamlining Reports
item-4.description: Remove appendix pages, outdated sections, or irrelevant content to create a concise report.

reversePdf.name: Reverse PDF
reversePdf.description: Reverse the page order of a PDF document.
reversePdf.metaTitle: Reverse PDF Page Order Online Free
reversePdf.metaDescription: Reverse the page order of PDF documents for free. Flip your PDF pages from last to first instantly. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
reversePdf.longDescription: Reverse the entire page order of your PDF document so the last page becomes the first and vice versa. This is useful for correcting print order issues, reversing chronological documents, or preparing files for specific binding requirements.

item-1.question: What does reversing a PDF do?
item-1.answer: Reversing a PDF flips the page order so the last page becomes the first page, the second-to-last becomes the second, and so on through the entire document.

item-2.question: Will reversing affect the content on each page?
item-2.answer: No. Only the order of pages changes. The content, formatting, and orientation of each individual page remain exactly the same.

item-3.question: Can I reverse a PDF with hundreds of pages?
item-3.answer: Yes. The tool handles PDFs of any length. Larger documents may take a few moments to process depending on your device.

item-4.question: Is there a way to reverse only some pages?
item-4.answer: This tool reverses the entire document. To rearrange specific pages, use the Reorder Pages tool instead.

item-5.question: Can I reverse the PDF back to its original order?
item-5.answer: Yes. Simply run the reversed PDF through the tool again to restore the original page order.

item-1.title: Correcting Print Order
item-1.description: Reverse page order when a printer outputs pages in the wrong sequence.

item-2.title: Chronological Adjustment
item-2.description: Flip date-ordered documents so the most recent entries appear first.

item-3.title: Booklet Preparation
item-3.description: Reverse page order to prepare documents for specific booklet binding or duplex printing.

item-4.title: Presentation Reordering
item-4.description: Quickly reverse a slide deck to review content from end to beginning.

pdfToText.name: PDF to Text
pdfToText.description: Extract text content from PDF documents.
pdfToText.metaTitle: Extract Text from PDF Online Free - PDF to Text Converter
pdfToText.metaDescription: Extract text content from PDF documents for free. Copy text or download as TXT file. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
pdfToText.longDescription: Extract all readable text content from your PDF documents. View the extracted text, copy it to your clipboard, or download it as a plain text file. Ideal for repurposing PDF content, text analysis, and accessibility conversion.

item-1.question: Can this tool extract text from scanned PDFs?
item-1.answer: This tool extracts embedded text data from PDFs. Scanned documents that consist of images without embedded text layers will not yield readable text. OCR functionality is not currently supported.

item-2.question: Will the extracted text preserve the original formatting?
item-2.answer: The extracted text is plain text without formatting such as bold, italic, or font styles. The text order follows the logical reading order of the PDF content.

item-3.question: Can I extract text from a specific page only?
item-3.answer: Currently, the tool extracts text from all pages at once. You can then copy the portion you need from the extracted results.

item-4.question: What languages are supported?
item-4.answer: The tool extracts text in any language that is embedded in the PDF, including Latin, CJK (Chinese, Japanese, Korean), Arabic, and other scripts.

item-5.question: Can I download the extracted text?
item-5.answer: Yes. You can copy the text to your clipboard or download it as a .txt file for further use.

item-1.title: Content Repurposing
item-1.description: Extract text from PDF reports, articles, or e-books to reuse content in other formats.

item-2.title: Data Entry and Analysis
item-2.description: Pull text from PDF invoices, forms, or tables for data entry into spreadsheets or databases.

item-3.title: Accessibility Conversion
item-3.description: Convert PDF documents to plain text for screen readers and other assistive technologies.

item-4.title: Search and Indexing
item-4.description: Extract text from PDF archives to create searchable indexes or full-text search databases.

bmpToPdf.name: BMP to PDF
bmpToPdf.description: Convert BMP images to a PDF document.
bmpToPdf.metaTitle: Convert BMP to PDF Online Free - BMP to PDF Converter
bmpToPdf.metaDescription: Convert BMP bitmap images to PDF for free. Combine multiple BMP files into one PDF. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
bmpToPdf.longDescription: Convert your BMP (Bitmap) images into a PDF document. Upload multiple BMP files, arrange them in your preferred order with drag-and-drop, and combine them into a single PDF. BMP images are embedded with full quality preservation.

item-1.question: Will BMP image quality be preserved in the PDF?
item-1.answer: Yes. BMP images are embedded at their original resolution and quality in the PDF document without any compression loss.

item-2.question: Can I combine multiple BMP files into one PDF?
item-2.answer: Yes. Upload as many BMP files as you need, arrange them in your desired order with drag-and-drop, and convert them into a single PDF.

item-3.question: Why are BMP files so large?
item-3.answer: BMP is an uncompressed raster format, so files are typically much larger than JPG or PNG. Converting to PDF can make them easier to share and organize.

item-4.question: What will the PDF page size be?
item-4.answer: Each PDF page is automatically sized to match the dimensions of its corresponding BMP image.

item-5.question: Are my files uploaded to a server?
item-5.answer: No. All processing happens directly in your browser. Your BMP files never leave your device.

item-1.title: Legacy Image Conversion
item-1.description: Convert older BMP screenshots or graphics into modern, shareable PDF documents.

item-2.title: Medical and Scientific Imaging
item-2.description: Compile BMP images from diagnostic equipment or scientific instruments into organized PDF reports.

item-3.title: Archiving Bitmap Graphics
item-3.description: Convert collections of BMP files into compact PDF archives for long-term storage.

item-4.title: Print Preparation
item-4.description: Convert BMP artwork or graphics into PDF format for reliable printing across different devices.

gifToPdf.name: GIF to PDF
gifToPdf.description: Convert GIF images to a PDF document.
gifToPdf.metaTitle: Convert GIF to PDF Online Free - GIF to PDF Converter
gifToPdf.metaDescription: Convert GIF images to PDF for free. Combine multiple GIF files into one PDF. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
gifToPdf.longDescription: Convert your GIF images into a PDF document. Upload multiple GIF files, arrange them in your preferred order with drag-and-drop, and combine them into a single PDF. Static GIF images are embedded with full quality preservation.

item-1.question: Does this tool support animated GIFs?
item-1.answer: The tool converts the first frame of animated GIFs into the PDF. For animated GIFs, only the static first frame is captured.

item-2.question: Will GIF image quality be preserved?
item-2.answer: Yes. GIF images are embedded at their original resolution in the PDF document without quality loss.

item-3.question: Can I combine multiple GIF files into one PDF?
item-3.answer: Yes. Upload multiple GIF files, reorder them with drag-and-drop, and convert them into a single PDF document.

item-4.question: What will the PDF page size be?
item-4.answer: Each PDF page is automatically sized to match the dimensions of its corresponding GIF image.

item-5.question: Are my files uploaded to a server?
item-5.answer: No. All processing happens directly in your browser. Your GIF files never leave your device.

item-1.title: Diagram Collection
item-1.description: Compile GIF diagrams, flowcharts, or infographics into a single organized PDF.

item-2.title: Web Asset Documentation
item-2.description: Convert GIF icons, banners, or web graphics into a PDF reference document.

item-3.title: Storyboard Creation
item-3.description: Arrange GIF frames or illustrations into a sequential PDF storyboard.

item-4.title: Archiving Simple Graphics
item-4.description: Convert GIF logos, icons, and simple artwork into a PDF for organized digital archiving.

svgToPdf.name: SVG to PDF
svgToPdf.description: Convert SVG vector images to a PDF document.
svgToPdf.metaTitle: Convert SVG to PDF Online Free - SVG to PDF Converter
svgToPdf.metaDescription: Convert SVG vector images to PDF for free. Combine multiple SVG files into one PDF. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
svgToPdf.longDescription: Convert your SVG (Scalable Vector Graphics) images into a PDF document. Upload multiple SVG files, arrange them in your preferred order with drag-and-drop, and combine them into a single PDF. SVG vector quality is preserved at any scale.

item-1.question: Will vector quality be preserved in the PDF?
item-1.answer: SVG images are rasterized at high resolution during conversion. The resulting PDF images are sharp and clear, though they become raster-based rather than vector.

item-2.question: Can I combine multiple SVG files into one PDF?
item-2.answer: Yes. Upload multiple SVG files, arrange them in your preferred order, and convert them all into a single PDF document.

item-3.question: What SVG features are supported?
item-3.answer: Standard SVG elements including shapes, paths, text, gradients, and transforms are supported. Complex filters or animations may not render identically.

item-4.question: What will the PDF page size be?
item-4.answer: Each PDF page is automatically sized to match the dimensions defined in the SVG file's viewBox or width/height attributes.

item-5.question: Are my files uploaded to a server?
item-5.answer: No. All processing happens directly in your browser. Your SVG files never leave your device.

item-1.title: Design Portfolio
item-1.description: Compile SVG illustrations, logos, and design work into a professional PDF portfolio.

item-2.title: Technical Drawings
item-2.description: Convert SVG technical diagrams, schematics, or blueprints into shareable PDF documents.

item-3.title: Brand Asset Sheets
item-3.description: Create PDF brand guides by compiling SVG logos, icons, and brand elements.

item-4.title: Print-Ready Graphics
item-4.description: Convert SVG artwork to PDF format for high-quality printing and reproduction.

editMetadata.name: Edit Metadata
editMetadata.description: Edit PDF document metadata including title, author, and keywords.
editMetadata.metaTitle: Edit PDF Metadata Online Free - PDF Metadata Editor
editMetadata.metaDescription: Edit PDF metadata including title, author, subject, and keywords for free. Update document properties easily. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
editMetadata.longDescription: Edit the metadata properties of your PDF documents. Update the title, author, subject, keywords, creator, and producer fields to improve document organization, searchability, and professional presentation. All changes are applied instantly in your browser.

item-1.question: What is PDF metadata?
item-1.answer: PDF metadata includes document properties like title, author, subject, keywords, creator, and producer. This information helps organize, search, and identify PDF files.

item-2.question: Which metadata fields can I edit?
item-2.answer: You can edit six fields: Title, Author, Subject, Keywords, Creator, and Producer. All fields are optional and can be left blank.

item-3.question: Will editing metadata change the document content?
item-3.answer: No. Editing metadata only changes the document properties. The visible content, formatting, and pages remain completely unchanged.

item-4.question: How do keywords help with searchability?
item-4.answer: Keywords are indexed by search engines and document management systems, making it easier to find your PDF when searching for specific terms.

item-5.question: Can I view the current metadata before editing?
item-5.answer: Yes. When you upload a PDF, the existing metadata fields are automatically populated so you can see and modify the current values.

item-1.title: Professional Document Preparation
item-1.description: Set proper title and author fields before sharing reports, proposals, or contracts with clients.

item-2.title: Document Library Management
item-2.description: Add consistent metadata to PDFs for better organization in document management systems.

item-3.title: SEO for Published PDFs
item-3.description: Add descriptive titles, subjects, and keywords to PDFs published online for better search engine visibility.

item-4.title: Compliance and Record Keeping
item-4.description: Update author and producer fields to meet regulatory or organizational documentation requirements.

cropPdf.name: Crop PDF
cropPdf.description: Crop and adjust PDF page margins.
cropPdf.metaTitle: Crop PDF Pages Online Free - Adjust PDF Margins
cropPdf.metaDescription: Crop PDF page margins for free. Adjust top, bottom, left, and right margins precisely. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
cropPdf.longDescription: Crop the margins of your PDF pages to remove unwanted whitespace or adjust the visible area. Set precise margin values for top, right, bottom, and left sides. Apply cropping to all pages uniformly for a clean, professional result.

item-1.question: How does PDF cropping work?
item-1.answer: Cropping adjusts the visible area of each page by setting new margin boundaries. Content outside the crop area is hidden but not permanently deleted from the file.

item-2.question: Can I set different margins for each side?
item-2.answer: Yes. You can independently adjust the top, right, bottom, and left margins to crop each side precisely.

item-3.question: Will cropping affect all pages?
item-3.answer: Yes. The crop settings are applied uniformly to all pages in the document for consistent results.

item-4.question: Can I undo the cropping?
item-4.answer: The original file is never modified. If you need to adjust the cropping, simply process the original file again with different margin values.

item-5.question: What units are the margin values in?
item-5.answer: Margin values are specified in points (1 point = 1/72 inch). You can enter precise values for exact control over the crop area.

item-1.title: Removing Excess Whitespace
item-1.description: Trim large margins and unnecessary whitespace around PDF content for a tighter layout.

item-2.title: Standardizing Page Margins
item-2.description: Apply uniform margins to documents with inconsistent spacing for a professional appearance.

item-3.title: Print Preparation
item-3.description: Adjust margins to fit specific paper sizes or printing requirements before sending to press.

item-4.title: Removing Headers and Footers
item-4.description: Crop out existing headers, footers, or watermarks by trimming the top or bottom margins.

flattenPdf.name: Flatten PDF
flattenPdf.description: Flatten PDF form fields and annotations into static content.
flattenPdf.metaTitle: Flatten PDF Online Free - Flatten Forms & Annotations
flattenPdf.metaDescription: Flatten PDF form fields and annotations for free. Convert interactive elements to static content. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
flattenPdf.longDescription: Flatten your PDF documents to convert all interactive form fields, annotations, and comments into static, non-editable content. This ensures the document appears identically on every device and prevents further modifications to form data.

item-1.question: What does flattening a PDF mean?
item-1.answer: Flattening a PDF converts all interactive elements such as form fields, checkboxes, dropdown menus, and annotations into static content that is permanently embedded in the page.

item-2.question: Why would I want to flatten a PDF?
item-2.answer: Flattening ensures the document looks the same on every device and PDF viewer. It also prevents accidental or intentional changes to form data and annotations.

item-3.question: Can I edit form fields after flattening?
item-3.answer: No. Once flattened, form fields become part of the static page content and can no longer be edited. Keep your original file if you may need to make changes later.

item-4.question: Will flattening reduce the file size?
item-4.answer: In many cases, yes. Flattening removes the interactive form structure and can reduce file size, especially for forms with many fields.

item-5.question: Does flattening affect the visual appearance?
item-5.answer: No. The visual appearance remains identical. All filled form values and annotations are preserved exactly as they appear, just as non-editable content.

item-1.title: Finalizing Completed Forms
item-1.description: Flatten filled PDF forms to lock in responses and prevent accidental edits before submission or archiving.

item-2.title: Ensuring Display Consistency
item-2.description: Flatten PDFs to guarantee they render identically across all PDF viewers, devices, and operating systems.

item-3.title: Preparing for Digital Signatures
item-3.description: Flatten annotations and form fields before applying digital signatures to ensure document integrity.

item-4.title: Archiving Official Documents
item-4.description: Flatten completed government forms, contracts, or official records for tamper-resistant long-term archival.
